channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- NetExtender
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- NetExtender

item.title: CVE-2023-44220|2023-10-27T07:44:40.869Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: SonicWall NetExtender Windows (32-bit and 64-bit) client 10.2.336 and earlier versions have a DLL Search Order Hijacking vulnerability in the start-up DLL component. Successful exploitation via a local attacker could result in command execution in the target system.

item.title: CVE-2023-44217|2023-10-03T07:54:14.937Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in SonicWall Net Extender MSI client for Windows 10.2.336 and earlier versions allows a local low-privileged user to gain system privileges through running repair functionality.

item.title: CVE-2023-44218|2023-10-03T08:00:04.401Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: A flaw within the SonicWall NetExtender Pre-Logon feature enables an unauthorized user to gain access to the host Windows operating system with 'SYSTEM' level privileges, leading to a local privilege escalation (LPE) vulnerability.
